attributes.action: Stop the Poisoning of Rabbits on St Helena Island.
attributes.background:
St Helena is a small Island in the South Atlantic Ocean. Part of the Overseas Dependent Territory.  
Pindone causes pain and suffering to rabbits and takes up to 14 days to become effective. 
This is cruel to the rabbits, we need an alternative.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Government and Legislative Council of St Helena, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to put pressure on the Government of St Helena about this issue, if that's what you want to happen.
